name: @lillallol/outline-pdf
description: High level API to add outline to a pdf without any dependency on other programming languages. Works in both browser and node.

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build-cjs && npm run build-esm
scripts.pre-bump: npm run dead-files && npm run spell-check && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && git add --all && git commit
scripts.release: npm run pre-bump && npm publish --access public && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-bump && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-bump && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-bump && npm version major && npm publish && npm run after-bump

author: lillallol
